Enum StillCaptureMode

    • Enum Constant Summary

      Enum Constants 
      Enum Constant and Description
      INTERVAL_SHOT
      Interval shooting mode.
      SINGLE_SHOT
      Single shot mode.
      VIDEO
      The shooting mode is "Video shooting mode".

    • Enum Constant Detail

      • VIDEO

        public static final StillCaptureMode VIDEO
        The shooting mode is "Video shooting mode".

        Cannot change to other Still Capture Modes. (Model: RICOH THETA m15)

      • SINGLE_SHOT

        public static final StillCaptureMode SINGLE_SHOT
        Single shot mode.

        Default value when the shooting mode is "Still image shooting mode".

      • INTERVAL_SHOT

        public static final StillCaptureMode INTERVAL_SHOT
        Interval shooting mode.

        TimelapseNumber and TimelapseInterval cannot be changed when this mode is set. Change these setting values before switching to interval shooting mode.

        See Also:
        Theta.setTimelapseNumber(int), Theta.setTimelapseInterval(long)
